org.apache.flex.abc.semantics

Class ImmediateOperandInstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.Instruction
      • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.ImmediateOperandInstruction

  • public class ImmediateOperandInstruction
extends Instruction
    An Instruction implementation with one immediate operand.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean allowAnyDeferredIntermediate
      Set this to allow any immediate instruction to set its immediate field after construction.
